attributes.action: Sack any members of parliament found to be making a profit from the MP's expenses system.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: any members of parliament found to have made a profit from the MP's expenses system should repay the money be dismised as an MP, and loose all privileges and benefits gained from their employment as an MP.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
